explains: adv. 公然地；喧闹地；看穿了地

sentences.en: He just blatantly lied about it.
sentences.cn: 他简直是睁着眼睛说瞎话。

sentences.en: For years, blatantly false assertions have gone unchallenged.
sentences.cn: 很多年来，极其错误的断言从未曾受到质疑。

sentences.en: It became blatantly obvious to me that the band wasn't going to last.
sentences.cn: 我看得再清楚不过，这个乐队存在不了多久。
